price: Ni jedhe: “Baraa, Rabbiin keessan Gooftaa samiileefi dachiiti, kan isaan uume sani, Ani kana irratti ragaa bahootarraayi.”
arabic: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمۡ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal rabbukum rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alladhī faṭarahunna wa-anā ʿalā dhālikum mina al-shāhidīna
